QuestData.Title: Petitioning Krag'wa
QuestData.Description:
Nothing! I cannot believe de weapon had no effect!
Damn Ateena and her dark magic! We must get up there somehow, kill her for good, and remove dat barrier!
But how can we get to de top of dat building... ah, of course! Krag'wa!
De loa of frogs hates de blood trolls. I am sure he will lend us his aid. Then, finally, we will be able to put an end to Ateena's madness.
QuestData.LogDescription: Summon Krag'wa to ask for his help.
